title: Can I find my TalkBand B2 using my phone?
answer:
B2 can’t be found by your phone. 

 You can use your TalkBand B2 to find your phone. To do so: 

 Connect your TalkBand B2 to your phone through Bluetooth and open the Huawei Wear application. Press the side button on the TalkBand B2 and flick to the Find my phone screen. If your phone is within range, it will vibrate or beep. We will consider adding support for the reverse in the future.
